original_title: Hello Kitty Has Fun at Halloween
overview: Hello Kitty and her friends share a variety of spooky and fun Halloween adventures in four short segments based on classic stories: "The Phantom of the Theatre", "Frankencat", "Catula", and "KT - Kitty Terrestrial".
tagline: Discover big fun with Hello Kitty in four larger-than-life adventures!
title: Hello Kitty Has Fun at Halloween
